name: Windows95 YouTube
tech: React, React95 UI Library, YouTube API, Heroku
description: What would YouTube look like on the Windows95 OS?

name: DinnerFlix
description: A React app Netflix clone, with ONLY the movie 'My Dinner with Andre', running an Astra DB API with GraphQL.

name: Eat A Burger
description: A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. Follows an MVC design pattern to use Node and MySQL to query and route data, and Handlebars to generate the HTML.

name: Hashtag Goals
tech: Node.js, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Handlebars, Semantic UI, Passport, Bcrypt, Heroku
description: The user creates an account then chooses a goal and how many times a week they can dedicate to achieving their goal. A calendar populates a series of minor milestones at their requested frequency.

name: Creative Coding
description: Art made by coding in p5.js
